column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////* Creamed Spinach. This was also tasty
column2: and like the mashed potatoes was not overly greasy/creamy. I have gotten creamed spinach in town in years past
column3: and it is often a testament to the gluttony of American society. While this was plenty flavorful
column4: the dish was not 1000 calories of green cream & cheese. It was good
